p: GraphPad Prism (version 5.0, GraphPad Software, San Diego, CA, USA) was used for statistical analysis of experimental results. Data were expressed as mean±standard error of the mean (SEM). Mean values were evaluated using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Tukey’s post hoc test. Levels of significance were accepted at P<0.05, P<0.01, and P<0.001.
